title: Grounded
description: Eenralla lived in a Dome,That Dome was controlled by the Government.The Government had a secret.That secret is out now, thanks to Eenralla.But now it doesn't matter...Her brain isn't even hers.Will she ever get it back?Sier knows about the wipe, but she doesn't care. Just as long as she's alive and breathing. But now, she sees the lies behind the truths, and she understands what's happening. She understands, even though her brain activity is supposed to be shut off. Could this be the work of Eenralla Land?It's time to wake up.
author: K. Weikel
